Name: SurvivalZ
About the game: A virus ravaged the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone or in groups you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by living dead! Find weapons, hunt for food, go to the cities to refuel, find a car, get resources and build your base! But be careful zombies may not be the biggest threat to you ... In SurvivalZ , you can also fight with friends in the PVP arena or have fun in the Sandbox world! Happy hunting! Features: ► Cubic open world! ► No less than 15 different weapons! ► Choice of 5 characters! ► 3 different maps! ► Single or multiplayer mode! ► Different type of enemies! ► Building system! ► Day / night cycle! ► Craft system! ► Water and food system! ► Several vehicles!
